page.t: {2,0}Sorry, sir. But we don't need newbee pilot with a such [red]lame[/red] ship [yellow]%s \(%s\)[/yellow]\nThe pilot MUST to install required equipment: \n[yellow]%s[/yellow]

{2,0}Sorry, sir. But the pilot of your ship [yellow]%s \(%s\)[/yellow] is a drunkard.
Where did he wasted required equipment? 
[yellow]%s[/yellow]
We dismiss him immediately

{2,0}Sir! We lost the ship[yellow]%s \(%s\)[/yellow] in [yellow]%s[/yellow]
 It was destroyed by [red]%s[/red]. The pilot of the ship is dead.
His last transmission was:
 [magenta]MAYDAY!!! MAYDAY!!! I need a backup immedeatly!! The ship is damaged, cargo is lost. MAYADaaaahhhrr........[/magenta]
We are seeking venegance upon them!
{2,0}Sir! One of ower ships [yellow]%s \(%s\)[/yellow] in [yellow]%s[/yellow]\n is under attack by [red]%s[/red]. Urgent backup is needed!!
